dcterms:creator: I. Mccowan
G. Lathoud
M. Lincoln
A. Lisowska
W. Post
D. Reidsma
P. Wellner
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 142 transcripts of meetings, each with 4 to 5 attendants, and their abstract summaries. Each transcript is around 10,000 words long, and each summary is around 100 words long.
dcterms:title: AMI Meeting Corpus

dcterms:creator: A. See
P. J. Liu
C. D. Manning
dcterms:description: This dataset contains over 300,000 news articles from CNN and Dailymail. Each article also contains a summary written by a human journalist. Each news article text is around 750 words long, and its multiple sentences summary is around 50 words long.
dcterms:title: CNN-DailyMail
